2oz (60ml) Cognac
3oz (90ml) Hot Bergamot Tea Syrup
1oz (30ml) Heavy Cream
2 Dashes Orange Bitters

Build in mug. Mix heavy cream with orange bitters and layer. 

Bergamot Tea Syrup
6oz (180ml) Earl Grey Tea (or other tea featuring Bergamot)
.25 Cup or 2oz (60m) Sugar

steep teabags for 4 minutes in water, add sugar and dissolve. Make Cocktail when liquid is still Hot!
title: Howick Hall
